game.name: Super Dark Deception
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Death awaits you once again in Super Dark Deception, a fun 2D reimagining of the hit horror maze game, Dark Deception!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Death awaits you once again in Super Dark Deception, a fun 2D reimagining of the hit horror maze game, Dark Deception!

reviewHighlights.text: Good game. when is chapter 2 coming out?
This game is really good it's not very scary then the Official Dark Deception but this game is still pretty good
